title: [1.7.10]bspkrsCore-universal-6.12.jar这是什么MOD
author: yxc18285563677
txt_content: 如题，求助这个MOD的中文名，或者谁能告诉我在哪下     [1.7.10]bspkrsCore-universal-6.12.jar

replies.author: ゞ刹那芳华
replies.txt_content: 楼主你好，这个是一些mod的支持文件，如ArmorStatusHUD显示耐久和砍树mod，至于下载地址论坛的帖

replies.author: yxc18285563677
replies.txt_content:
